name: CKSubscription
desc: An abstract base class for subscriptions.

items.name: var notificationInfo: CKSubscription.NotificationInfo?
items.desc: The configuration for a subscription’s push notifications.

items.name: class CKSubscription.NotificationInfo
items.desc: An object that describes the configuration of a subscription’s push notifications.

items.name: typealias CKSubscription.ID
items.desc: A type that represents a subscription’s identifier.

items.name: var subscriptionType: CKSubscription.SubscriptionType
items.desc: The behavior that a subscription provides.

items.name: enum CKSubscription.SubscriptionType
items.desc: Constants that identify a subscription’s behavior.
